items: Start by lying on your back on a flat surface with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Hold a medicine ball with both hands at chest level.
Engage your core and press your lower back into the ground.
Exhale and forcefully throw the medicine ball straight up towards the ceiling, extending your arms fully.
Catch the ball as it comes back down and immediately repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.
Remember to keep your core engaged and your lower back pressed into the ground throughout the exercise.
Targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps
Improves upper body power and explosiveness
Engages the core muscles for stability and balance
Can be modified for different fitness levels and goals
Provides a full body workout when combined with other exercises
Pectoralis major
Triceps brachii
Anterior deltoids
Core muscles (rectus abdominis, obliques)
